Gear Type: Trawl net is a ¾ size North Atlantic type two seam otter trawl (39’ headrope/51’ footrope) rigged with a 3.5” rubber disc sweep and a ¼” knotless codend liner (1/2” stretched mesh)
Modified shrimp net with a 2-inch mesh in wings and 1-inch mesh liner in the cod end
Bag seine 30.5 m long and 1.8 m high with 6.4 mm mesh
